original.name: Concentratred Colonizer
original.body: For each of your foreign colonies that has three or more ships on it:

original.name: Diverse Investor
original.body: For each type of card in your hand (attack, negotiate, artifact, etc.):

original.name: Emptiest Mind
original.body: Have (or be tied for) the fewest cards in hand.

original.name: Expanded Borders
original.body: Have at least two foreign colonies in the same system.

original.name: Friendly
original.body: For each planet you occupy that has another player's ship on it:

original.name: Hoardest
original.body: Have (or be tied for) the most cards in hand.

original.name: Host with the Most
original.body: For each ship belonging to other players in your home system:

original.name: Lone colonizer
original.body: Have (or be tied for) the most foreign colonies that have no other player's ships on them.

original.name: Luminosity
original.body: For each flare in your hand:

original.name: Neighbors
original.body: A player sitting next to you has at least two colonies where you also have a colony.

original.name: Out of Warp
original.body: Have (or be tied for) the fewest ships in the warp.

original.name: Self-Disciplined
original.body: Add half the value of the highest attack card in your hand (rounding up) to your score.

original.name: Stockpiler
original.body: Add the value of each reinforcement in your hand to your score.

original.name: Synced Minds
original.body: Have the same number of cards in hand as at least one other player.

original.name: Warmonger
original.body: For each negotiate in your hand:

original.name: Warp Explorer
original.body: Have (or be tied for) the most ships in the warp.
